title: Current Electricity
description: Understanding electric current, voltage, resistance and circuit analysis
description_zh: 理解电流、电压、电阻和电路分析
objectives: Define current, voltage and resistance with their SI units
Apply Ohm's Law to solve circuit problems
Calculate power and energy in electrical circuits
objectives_zh: 定义电流、电压和电阻及其国际单位
应用欧姆定律解决电路问题
计算电路中的功率和能量

sections.title: Current, Voltage and Resistance
sections.content:
**Electric Current (I):**
• Flow of electric charge through a conductor
• SI unit: ampere (A)
• Measured using ammeter (connected in series)
• Direction: from positive to negative terminal (conventional current)

**Voltage/Potential Difference (V):**
• Energy transferred per unit charge
• SI unit: volt (V)
• Measured using voltmeter (connected in parallel)
• Battery/cell provides voltage

**Resistance (R):**
• Opposition to current flow
• SI unit: ohm (Ω)
• Factors affecting resistance:
  - Length (longer = more resistance)
  - Cross-sectional area (thicker = less resistance)
  - Material (conductivity)
  - Temperature
sections.content_zh:
**电流（I）：**
• 电荷通过导体的流动
• 国际单位：安培（A）
• 使用电流表测量（串联连接）
• 方向：从正极到负极（常规电流）

**电压/电位差（V）：**
• 每单位电荷传递的能量
• 国际单位：伏特（V）
• 使用电压表测量（并联连接）
• 电池/电池提供电压

**电阻（R）：**
• 对电流流动的阻力
• 国际单位：欧姆（Ω）
• 影响电阻的因素：
  - 长度（更长=更多电阻）
  - 横截面积（更粗=更少电阻）
  - 材料（导电性）
  - 温度

sections.title: Ohm's Law
sections.content:
**Ohm's Law:**
V = IR

Where:
• V = voltage (V)
• I = current (A)
• R = resistance (Ω)

**Key Points:**
• Voltage is directly proportional to current (at constant resistance)
• Current decreases as resistance increases (at constant voltage)
• A graph of V vs I gives a straight line for ohmic conductors

**Example:**
If a resistor has resistance 10Ω and current 2A flows through it:
V = IR = 2 × 10 = 20V

**Applications:**
• Calculating required resistance for circuits
• Determining safe current levels
• Designing electrical systems
sections.content_zh:
**欧姆定律：**
V = IR

其中：
• V = 电压（V）
• I = 电流（A）
• R = 电阻（Ω）

**要点：**
• 电压与电流成正比（恒定电阻时）
• 电流随电阻增加而减小（恒定电压时）
• 欧姆导体的V对I图给出直线

**示例：**
如果电阻器的电阻为10Ω，流过2A电流：
V = IR = 2 × 10 = 20V

**应用：**
• 计算电路所需电阻
• 确定安全电流水平
• 设计电气系统

sections.title: Series and Parallel Circuits
sections.content:
**Series Circuits:**
• Components connected in a single loop
• Same current through all components (I₁ = I₂ = I₃)
• Total voltage = sum of individual voltages (V_total = V₁ + V₂ + V₃)
• Total resistance = sum of individual resistances (R_total = R₁ + R₂ + R₃)
• If one component fails, circuit breaks

**Parallel Circuits:**
• Components connected across multiple branches
• Same voltage across all components (V₁ = V₂ = V₃ = V_total)
• Total current = sum of branch currents (I_total = I₁ + I₂ + I₃)
• Total resistance: 1/R_total = 1/R₁ + 1/R₂ + 1/R₃
• If one component fails, others continue working

**Home Wiring:**
Houses use parallel circuits so:
• All appliances get same voltage (230V in Singapore)
• Appliances work independently
• Can switch devices on/off without affecting others
sections.content_zh:
**串联电路：**
• 组件连接在单个回路中
• 所有组件的电流相同（I₁ = I₂ = I₃）
• 总电压=各个电压之和（V_总 = V₁ + V₂ + V₃）
• 总电阻=各个电阻之和（R_总 = R₁ + R₂ + R₃）
• 如果一个组件失效，电路断开

**并联电路：**
• 组件跨多个分支连接
• 所有组件的电压相同（V₁ = V₂ = V₃ = V_总）
• 总电流=分支电流之和（I_总 = I₁ + I₂ + I₃）
• 总电阻：1/R_总 = 1/R₁ + 1/R₂ + 1/R₃
• 如果一个组件失效，其他组件继续工作

**家庭布线：**
房屋使用并联电路，因此：
• 所有电器获得相同电压（新加坡为230V）
• 电器独立工作
• 可以打开/关闭设备而不影响其他设备

sections.title: Electrical Power and Energy
sections.content:
**Electrical Power (P):**
• Rate of energy transfer
• SI unit: watt (W) or kilowatt (kW)
• Formulas:
  - P = VI (power = voltage × current)
  - P = I²R (power = current² × resistance)
  - P = V²/R (power = voltage² / resistance)

**Electrical Energy (E):**
• Total energy consumed
• SI unit: joule (J) or kilowatt-hour (kWh)
• Formula: E = Pt (energy = power × time)
• 1 kWh = 3,600,000 J

**Example:**
A 2kW heater runs for 3 hours:
Energy = 2kW × 3h = 6 kWh

**Electricity Bills in Singapore:**
• Charged per kWh consumed
• SP Group charges about $0.30 per kWh
• Cost = Energy (kWh) × Tariff
• Energy-efficient appliances save money
sections.content_zh:
**电功率（P）：**
• 能量传递速率
• 国际单位：瓦特（W）或千瓦（kW）
• 公式：
  - P = VI（功率=电压×电流）
  - P = I²R（功率=电流²×电阻）
  - P = V²/R（功率=电压²/电阻）

**电能（E）：**
• 消耗的总能量
• 国际单位：焦耳（J）或千瓦时（kWh）
• 公式：E = Pt（能量=功率×时间）
• 1千瓦时 = 3,600,000焦耳

**示例：**
一个2千瓦的加热器运行3小时：
能量 = 2千瓦 × 3小时 = 6千瓦时

**新加坡的电费单：**
• 按消耗的千瓦时收费
• SP集团每千瓦时收费约$0.30
• 费用=能量（kWh）×电价
• 节能电器省钱

exercises.prompt: What is the SI unit of electric current?
exercises.prompt_zh: 电流的国际单位是什么？
exercises.hint: This unit is named after a French physicist.
exercises.hint_zh: 这个单位以一位法国物理学家的名字命名。

exercises.prompt: Which instrument is used to measure voltage?
exercises.prompt_zh: 哪种仪器用于测量电压？
exercises.hint: This instrument is connected in parallel.
exercises.hint_zh: 这个仪器是并联连接的。

exercises.prompt: According to Ohm's Law, if voltage increases and resistance stays the same, what happens to current?
exercises.prompt_zh: 根据欧姆定律，如果电压增加而电阻保持不变，电流会发生什么变化？

exercises.prompt: A resistor has resistance 10Ω and current 2A flows through it. What is the voltage?
exercises.prompt_zh: 电阻器的电阻为10Ω，流过2A电流。电压是多少？

exercises.prompt: In a series circuit, what is the same for all components?
exercises.prompt_zh: 在串联电路中，所有组件的什么是相同的？
exercises.hint: There is only one path for charge to flow.
exercises.hint_zh: 电荷只有一个流动路径。

exercises.prompt: In a parallel circuit, what is the same across all branches?
exercises.prompt_zh: 在并联电路中，所有分支上的什么是相同的？
exercises.hint: All branches are connected to the same two points.
exercises.hint_zh: 所有分支都连接到相同的两个点。

exercises.prompt: Three resistors (2Ω, 3Ω, 5Ω) are connected in series. What is the total resistance?
exercises.prompt_zh: 三个电阻器（2Ω、3Ω、5Ω）串联连接。总电阻是多少？
exercises.hint: In series: R_total = R1 + R2 + R3
exercises.hint_zh: 在串联中：R_总 = R1 + R2 + R3

exercises.prompt: Why are household appliances connected in parallel circuits in Singapore homes?
exercises.prompt_zh: 为什么新加坡家庭中的家用电器连接在并联电路中？
choices: So each appliance can work independently and receives 230V
exercises.hint: Think about what happens when one appliance is switched off.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想当一个电器关闭时会发生什么。

exercises.prompt: What is the formula for electrical power in terms of voltage and current?
exercises.prompt_zh: 电功率用电压和电流表示的公式是什么？
exercises.hint_zh: 功率 = 电压 × 电流

exercises.prompt: A 2kW heater runs for 3 hours. How much energy is consumed in kWh?
exercises.prompt_zh: 一个2千瓦的加热器运行3小时。消耗多少千瓦时的能量？
exercises.hint_zh: 能量（kWh）= 功率（kW）× 时间（h）

exercises.prompt: What is the SI unit for electrical resistance?
exercises.prompt_zh: 电阻的国际单位是什么？
exercises.hint: It's represented by the Greek letter Ω.

exercises.prompt: What is the typical household voltage in Singapore?
exercises.prompt_zh: 新加坡典型的家庭电压是多少？
exercises.hint: It's higher than in the USA (110V).

exercises.prompt: If SP Group charges $0.30 per kWh, how much does it cost to run a 2kW aircon for 5 hours?
exercises.prompt_zh: 如果SP集团每千瓦时收费$0.30，运行一个2千瓦的空调5小时需要多少钱？
exercises.hint: Cost = Energy (kWh) × Tariff. First calculate energy: 2kW × 5h = 10kWh
exercises.hint_zh: 费用 = 能量（kWh）× 电价。首先计算能量：2千瓦 × 5小时 = 10千瓦时

exercises.prompt: An ammeter should be connected in ____ to measure current correctly.
exercises.prompt_zh: 电流表应该____连接以正确测量电流。
exercises.hint: Current must flow through the ammeter.

exercises.prompt: What happens to total resistance when more resistors are added in parallel?
exercises.prompt_zh: 当在并联中添加更多电阻器时，总电阻会发生什么变化？
exercises.hint: More parallel paths means easier for current to flow.
exercises.hint_zh: 更多并联路径意味着电流更容易流动。
